评论详情: Fabric is completed different than what it’s advertised to look like. It feels like pajama fabric, something you’d use for like a sleep shirt. Overall poor quality and a complete waste of money. It looks and feels cheap, would not recommend.
I just dont like polyester and i thought it was cotton :3

The advertised shirt looks like it’s knitted, thermal-like material. But it’s not. It looks like printed fabric. Color on the outside, but white on the inside. It just looks like poor quality, honestly. I wouldn’t recommend buying this.
Ordered a XL but fit more like a Medium. Sizing is way off
bought this thinking it's material would be knit. its a very flat and weirdly textured long sleeve. do not recommend. not worth the money at all.

The color of the shirt is actually a true baby pink  not the dusty almost brown one like the picture. Not only that but there is random red sewn into the shirt. Like a stain that is impossible to get rid of. very disappointed in the product i don’t recommend.
The fabric is not knit. If not looking for that it could be cute for you.
… and you think you can return and get a full refund. Yes, but I don’t think you can get the $6.99 shipping fee back that you paid when you purchased it. Clever.
